sections.title: Evangelist (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Evangelist class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Evangelist)
sections.description: Grants proficiency with simple weapons, light armor, and the chosen deity's favored weapon.

sections.title: Obedience (Ex) (Evangelist)
sections.description: Requires daily obedience to chosen deity to maintain all evangelist abilities including aligned class features.

sections.title: Skilled (Evangelist)
sections.description: Allows selection of two additional skills to add permanently to the evangelist's class skill list.

sections.title: Aligned Class (Ex) (Evangelist)
sections.description: Continues progression in a previously held class, gaining its class features while retaining evangelist's BAB, saves, and hit dice.

sections.title: Protective Grace (Su) (Evangelist)
sections.description: Grants a +1 dodge bonus to AC that increases to +2 at 7th level, lost when denied Dexterity bonus.

sections.title: Divine Boon (Evangelist)
sections.description: Grants three increasingly powerful deity-specific boons at 3rd, 6th, and 9th levels with spell-like abilities using character level as caster level.

sections.title: Gift of Tongues (Evangelist)
sections.description: Grants fluent knowledge of one new language at 4th level and another at 8th level as permanent divine gifts.

sections.title: Multitude of Talents (Ex) (Evangelist)
sections.description: Provides a +4 sacred or profane bonus on untrained skill checks for skills with no ranks.

sections.title: Spiritual Form (Su) (Evangelist)
sections.description: Grants the ability to assume a spiritual form with telepathy, chosen ability score bonus, and selected physical transformation for minutes per day equal to character level.
